DOC.brief_summary: This aim of the study is to evaluate the impact of endometrioma and laparoscopic cystectomy on ovarian reserve as measured by serum antimullerian hormone and to study the different effects of levels of serum antimullerian hormone between laparoscopic cystectomy and the non-ovarian pelvic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-Mullerian Hormone Changes After Laparoscopic Ovarian Cystectomy for Endometrioma Compared With the Non-ovarian Conditions
